void pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::AddMultiplyOrDivideHistograms ( const std::string &  nameHisto0,
const std::string &  nameHisto1,
double  coeff0,
double  coeff1,
bool  add,
bool  multiply 
)

Add, multiply or divide two histograms.

Parameters:
nameHisto0 the name associated with the first histogram
nameHisto1 the name associated with the second histogram
coeff0 coefficient for the first histogram
coeff1 coefficient for the second histogram
add add histograms
multiply if "add" is false, multiply the histograms (if multiply is true), else divide

void pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::SetEveDisplayParameters ( const bool  blackBackground,
const bool  showDetectors,
const float  transparencyThresholdE,
const float  energyScaleThresholdE 
)

Set TEve display parameters.

Parameters:
blackBackground whether to use a black background color, rather than white
showDetectors turns the visibility of the detector geometry on or off
transparencyThresholdE cell energy for which transparency is saturated (0%, fully opaque)
energyScaleThresholdE cell energy for which color is at top end of continous color palette

template<typename VariableType>
void pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::SetTreeVariable ( const std::string &  treeName,
const std::string &  variableName,
VariableType  variable 
)

Set a variable in a tree (create the tree and the branch if not yet existing).

Parameters:
treeName name of the tree (is created if it does not exist yet)
variableName name of the branch in the tree (the branch is created if it does not exist yet)
variable sets value of the variable (permitted types are float/double/int and std::vector<float>*,std::vector<double>*,std::vector<int>*

TEveElement * pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::VisualizeCaloHits ( const pandora::CaloHitList *const   pCaloHitList,
std::string  name,
TEveElement *  parent,
Color  color,
int  pfoId = 0 
)

Add CaloHits to the Eve event-display.

Parameters:
pCaloHitList list of calohits to be added to the event display
parent name of the calohitlist
parent pointer to the parent TEveElement. If NULL, the cluster will be parent element
color The color the cluster elements are drawn with
Returns:
pointer to created TEveElement

TEveElement * pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::VisualizeClusters ( const pandora::ClusterList *const   pClusterList,
std::string  name,
TEveElement *  parent,
Color  color,
bool  showAssociatedTracks,
int  pfoId = 0 
)

Add Clusters to the Eve event-display.

Parameters:
pClusterList list of clusters to be added to the event display
name of the cluster list
parent pointer to the parent TEveElement. If NULL, the cluster will be parent element
color The color the cluster elements are drawn with
showAssociatedTracks draw the tracks associated to the cluster
Returns:
pointer to created TEveElement

TEveElement * pandora_monitoring::PandoraMonitoring::VisualizeMCParticles ( const pandora::MCParticleList *const   pMCParticleList,
std::string  name,
TEveElement *  parent,
Color  color,
const PandoraMonitoringApi::PdgCodeToEnergyMap *  pParticleSuppressionMap 
)

Add MC particles to the Eve event-display.

Parameters:
pMCParticleList list of tracks to be added to the event display
name of the MC particle list
parent pointer to the parent TEveElement. If NULL, the track will be parent element
color The color the track elements are drawn with
pParticleSuppressionMap map from pdg-codes to energy for suppression of particles types below specific energies
Returns:
pointer to created TEveElement

showAssociatedTracks draw the tracks associated to the cluster
